main.div: Allows you to find a specific value in the list.

dl.dd: the callback function(item) that will be invoked for every list item until it returns a non-null value.
the true value returned by the callback function, or undefined it it never returned a valid value.

main.div: Allows you to find a specific value in the list. To do this, find() calls the given function for each list element until the function returns a value that is not null or undefined. This value will be returned.

div.div:
Goes through the elements to find the first div that has the class 'myClass', and returns this element:
var myClassElement = $('div').find(function(e) { if (/\bmyClass\b/.test(e.className)) return true; });
